title: NAC Stadion t Ploegske
text: `t Ploegske was a football <a href="stadium">stadium</a> in <a href="Breda%2C%20Netherlands">Breda, Netherlands</a>. It was used for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches and hosted the home matches of <a href="NAC%20Breda">NAC Breda</a>. The stadium was able to hold 3,000 people, including 150 seats. The stadium was opened in 1916 and demolished in 1931.
